hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) was attending a funeral. ‘Umar saw a woman and shouted at her, but the Prophet (ﷺ) said, “Leave her alone, O ‘Umar, for the eye weeps and the heart is afflicted, and the bereavement is recent.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْبُكَاءِ عَلَى الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning weeping for the deceased
